subject: Re: Ten Years of Test Driven Development
msgSnippet: Steve, I appreciate you giving me some homework over the holidays :-) When are the two of you supposed to give this talk? Johannes
messageBody:
Steve,

I appreciate you giving me some homework over the holidays :-)

When are the two of you supposed to give this talk?

Johannes

--- In junit@yahoogroups.com, Steve Freeman <smgfreeman@...> wrote:
>
> Michael Feathers and I are working up a talk that will be a review of
> effectively 10 years of TDD. The idea is partly just to look at the
> history, but mainly to consider what we've learned over all this time.
>
